headline.main: THE POULTRY CONVENTION.; Interesting Proceedings on the Adjournment, SHANGHAI'S ADDRESS. SPEECH OF BRAMAH POOTRA. Resolutions, Crowings, &c., & c,

byline.original: SPECIALLY REPORTED FOR THE NEW-YORK DAILY TIMES

headline.main: BROOKLYN CITY.; THE RESIGNATION OF REV. DR. COX. THE CHURCH CHARITY FOUNDATION. A WARNING.

docs.lead_paragraph: THE RESIGNATION OF REV. DR. COX.--We have already mentioned the fact that Rev. Dr. Cox has applied for a release from his pastoral relations with the First Presbyterian Church in Henry street. Dr. Cox has presided over this congregation for the past seventeen years. Continued ill-health compel him to desist from ministerial labors, and he intends to retire to the country, having purchased a small farm near Owego. hurch

headline.main: THREE DAYS LATER FROM EUROPE.; ARRIVAL OF THE EUROPA. WAR QUESTION UNCHANGED. ENGLISH PREPARATIONS. RUSSIAN LAND FORCE. The Fleets in the Black Sea. Posture of the Swedish Government. Cordial Relations between France and Belgium. COUNT ORLOFF'S RETURN. No Answer from St. Petersburg. Funds Steady--Money Easy--Grain and Flour Falling--Cotton Up.

docs.lead_paragraph: By the Cunard steamer Europa, from Liverpool, about 10 o'clock morning of Saturday, Feb. 11, we have advices from Liverpool, and by telegraph from London to that date. The Cunard Company contradict the statement that the British Government has chartered their steamers for the conveyance of troops to Turkey.

docs.lead_paragraph: During the past year there were 406 patients within the Pennsylvania Hospital for the Insane. 88 were cured, 16 much improved, 38 improved, and 15 died; yet there is room in the building for only 220. It seems that Penusylvania, having a population exceeding two and a half millions, has provision for only about nine hundred and thirty insane, while, at the end of 1840, with a population of less than two millions,

headline.main: BROOKLYN CITY.; FIREMAN'S RIOT. THE PRINCETON

docs.lead_paragraph: The ship Corneilus Grinnell, Capt. FLETCHER, from Liverpool, reports having had the roughest passage ever experienced by Capt. F., but has received no damage to hull, spars and sails. On Friday, 20th January, at noon, in latitude 48[degree], longitude 32[degree] saw it vessel with the American flag, union down, went to her assistance and found it to be the ship columbiana, of New-York, Capt. STAHL, from New-Orleans, bound to Liverpool.

docs.lead_paragraph: The city that should lack hotels, would be quite an anomaly in this age. A house for the traveler is erected in every settlement, generally long enough before it is easy to discover why travelers should ever visit the neighborhood. The natural order of building, in a new village, is-first, a tavern, then a carpenter's shop, then the blue light in the window announces an apothecary;

headline.main: THE FUTURE OF IRELAND.; Letter from John Martin to John Mitchel.

docs.lead_paragraph: A long private letter has been received from our friend, Mr. MARTIN-no part of it ??, intended for publication, and in truth the writer know not that by the time it would come to hand, his correspondent would be an Editor.
